attributes.action: Lower the cost of engery bills across the UK asap.
attributes.additional_details: Stop letting the engery companies getting away with increasing the price for Gas, Electric, Oil and Fuel. We need intervention now from the government to stop this madness.
attributes.background: Lower the cost of engery bills or freeze any increases as its already out of control and everyone is suffering, kids, eldery, businesses, families, schools etc. We cannot let this continue.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Temporarily suspend all taxes on all fuels and energy bills: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610585

Subsidise a 'basic' amount of electricity for households: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616915

Reform energy pricing and taxes to better protect lower income households: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621407

Allow energy bills to be paid as part of salary sacrifice, saving Tax & NI: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621576

Establish a not-for-profit state owned energy provider: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/617446

Introduce a "Triple lock" to restrict energy cap increases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621347

Recall Parliament to consider the Energy Price Cap Increase (Cancellation) Bill: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621634
